name: Fullstack E-Commerce Website
description: This project is a fullstack e-commerce website featuring CRUD operations, authentication, authorization, filtering, shopping cart, order tracking, and product reviews. It is implemented using Java, Spring Boot, React JS and MySQL.

name: Travel Blog Website
description: This project is a travel blog website featuring CRUD operations, user interactions, authentication, authorization, and an admin panel. It utilizes Java, Spring Boot, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and MySQL for development.

name: Image gallery Website
description: This website makes use of a 3rd party API( form Pexel) to fetch images images and videos. It is built using React JS with featurs like search and pagenation.
